mv T X m/q
-- x.go --
package p

import (
	_ "m/q"
)

type T int

const X T = 1
-- q/q.go --
package q
-- stdout --
diff old/x.go new/x.go
--- old/x.go
+++ new/x.go
@@ -3,7 +3,3 @@
 import (
 	_ "m/q"
 )
-
-type T int
-
-const X T = 1
diff old/q/x.go new/q/x.go
--- old/q/x.go
+++ new/q/x.go
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@

+
+type T int
